name: ad2ien-cv
description: An online resume made with Blow theme for Zola SSG built with tailwind css

scripts.uglify: npm run mkdir && uglifyjs ./src/js/main.js --compress --mangle -o ./static/js/main.js && uglifyjs ./src/js/page.js --compress --mangle -o ./static/js/page.js && uglifyjs ./src/js/search.js --compress --mangle -o ./static/js/search.js && uglifyjs ./src/js/lang.js --compress --mangle -o ./static/js/lang.js

author: Adrien Touzouli
